Text: Godlike. Works great on Windows 7 Ultimate 32bit. 9800 GTX (sli, 1gb cards, 2gb total). 6GB DDR3 Ram. Six core Intel 2.0GHZ. 1600x1200.
It's a very trippy game, i recommend you to try "Boston - More than a Feeling"! =)
When I go to install the game I get a ton of errors saying it's missing pretty much all of the installation files.  How do I get all the necessary files?

@njdss4
right click on the The_Polynomial_setup.exe, and choose the "run as administrator" option

This application has requested the Runtime to terminate it in an unusual way. Please contact the application's support team for more information.
